entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
